title: Netnography-Based Project Design for Enhancing Interactivity in Distance Education

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Course for professionals with medical/legal/technical backgrounds in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments (using only Zoom and basic forum tools), focusing on applying social interaction analysis methods to projects

learning_goals: Learners can analyze interaction patterns in online communities using netnography methodology.
Learners can perform project-based assessment tasks using smartphones.
Learners can establish criteria to evaluate the alignment between technological tools and assessment standards in remote education environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
